short-description:
Hello, I'm
Yojhan Rodr√≠guez.
I'm a junior web developer.
description: I'm a Colombian based web developer, passionate about technology, web development, languages and travels. I'm always willing to face new challenges and learn different things every day.
edu-desc: I majored in Telematics Engineering from Universidad Distrital (Bogota - Colombia). Also, I have an associate/technical degree in Systematization of data from the same school.
tools-desc: My skills cover technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Java, PHP Laravel and MySQL. Additionally, I'm currently improving my skills in popular JavaScript frameworks and libraries like Angular and React.
learn-desc: I consider myself to be a self-taught and committed person, who could show in a short period of time great potential to handle different tools or technologies.
langu-desc: I'm constantly keen on learning about other countries and their culture. I've been lucky to have experiences abroad which allowed me to be fluent in English and have a good knowledge of German.
text-goodbye:
Have any questions? Don't hesitate to contact me.
Just send me an email or contact me through the social sites listed below.
